item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: Wordle
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: Wordle
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/e-commerce/wordpress.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: Wordle
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we cant offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you havent received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If youve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, youll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasnt marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We dont guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: Wordle
item.content:encoded:
OUR SERVICES

Quality Auto Services in Beirut

At Pistons, we provide top-quality car repair services in Beirut. Our skilled technicians utilize advanced diagnostic tools and quality parts to ensure every repair meets the highest standards. We prioritize clear communication and honest estimates, consistently exceeding client expectations. When you choose Pistons, you're investing in reliable solutions that keep your vehicle safe and efficient. Trust us for all your automotive needs.

Book an Appointment

What We Do

At Pistons, we pride ourselves on being Beirut's top choice for car repair, offering expert service and quality you can trust. Our experienced technicians use advanced diagnostic tools to deliver precise repairs, ensuring your vehicle runs smoothly. With transparent communication and a commitment to customer satisfaction, choosing Pistons means investing in reliable automotive care.

Auto Maintenance Services

Our Auto Maintenance Services ensure your vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently. We handle routine tasks to prevent issues and extend your cars lifespan. With expert care, we help keep your vehicle safe, reliable, and road-ready.

Brake Repair Pads & Rotors

Our Brake Repair Pads & Rotors service ensures your safety with expert replacement and repair, restoring smooth and reliable braking for your vehicle.

Shocks, Struts Replacement

Our Shocks and Struts Replacement service improves your vehicle's handling, stability, and comfort by replacing worn components, ensuring a smoother and safer ride.

System Diagnosis & Repair

Our System Diagnosis & Repair service uses advanced tools to quickly identify and fix issues in your vehicle's engine, electrical, or mechanical systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.

Air Conditioning Services

Our Air Conditioning Services ensure your vehicle's climate control system is functioning efficiently. We provide comprehensive inspections, repairs, and recharges to keep you cool and comfortable in any weather.

Tires & Wheel Balancing

Our Tires & Wheel Balancing service enhances your vehicle's safety and performance by providing expert tire installation, rotation, and precise wheel balancing, ensuring a smooth ride and optimal handling.

Towing Service

At Pistons, our towing service offers quick and reliable assistance 24/7. Whether you're stranded or need vehicle transport, our skilled team is ready to ensure your vehicle is towed safely and efficiently to your desired location.

Jump Start

At Pistons, our jump start service quickly assists you when your vehicle wont start due to a dead battery. Our experienced technicians arrive on-site to safely jump-start your vehicle and get you back on the road in no time.

Body Repair & Painting

At Pistons, we offer expert body repair and paint services to restore your vehicles appearance and integrity. Our skilled technicians use high-quality materials and techniques to ensure a flawless finish that brings your car back to life.

Need a Roadside Assistance?

If you need roadside assistance, Pistonsis your reliable partner for quick and efficient help. Our dedicated team is available 24/7, ready to assist you with everything from flat tires and dead batteries to lockouts and fuel delivery. With our extensive experience and commitment to customer satisfaction, we ensure that help arrives promptly and that your vehicle is treated with the utmost care. Choosing Pistons means youre not just getting roadside assistance; youre choosing peace of mind knowing that you have a trusted expert by your side in any situation.

Request an Assistance

Our Costumer Say

Our Trusted Work is built on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. Our skilled technicians use high-quality parts and best practices, ensuring every service meets rigorous standards. We prioritize clear communication and honest estimates, fostering strong relationships with our customers. Your trust is our greatest achievement, and we aim to exceed your expectations with every visit.

I can't recommend Pistons enough! From the moment I walked in, the team was friendly and attentive. They diagnosed my cars issues quickly and explained everything in detail without any pressure to upsell services I didnt need. The repairs were completed on time and at a fair price. My car has never driven better! It's clear that they genuinely care about their customers and take pride in their work. Ill definitely be returning for all my future car needs! Howard Chavez Entrepreneur I had an outstanding experience at Pistons! The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to answer all my questions. They performed a thorough inspection and provided honest recommendations without pushing unnecessary services. The quality of their work is excellent, and my car runs like new! I appreciate their transparency and commitment to customer satisfaction. I will be recommending them to friends and family! Lucas Elliot Designer  4.6/5

If you need roadside assistance, Pistonsis your reliable partner for quick and efficient help. Our dedicated team is available 24/7, ready to assist you with everything from flat tires and dead batteries to lockouts and fuel delivery. I can't recommend Pistons enough! From the moment I walked in, the team was friendly and attentive. Howard Chavez
Entrepreneur

{"timeout":1729501074,"value":{"content":"
OUR SERVICES

Quality Auto Services in Beirut

At Pistons, we provide top-quality car repair services in Beirut. Our skilled technicians utilize advanced diagnostic tools and quality parts to ensure every repair meets the highest standards. We prioritize clear communication and honest estimates, consistently exceeding client expectations. When you choose Pistons, you’re investing in reliable solutions that keep your vehicle safe and efficient. Trust us for all your automotive needs.

Book an Appointment

What We Do

At Pistons, we pride ourselves on being Beirut’s top choice for car repair, offering expert service and quality you can trust. Our experienced technicians use advanced diagnostic tools to deliver precise repairs, ensuring your vehicle runs smoothly. With transparent communication and a commitment to customer satisfaction, choosing Pistons means investing in reliable automotive care.

Auto Maintenance Services​

Our Auto Maintenance Services ensure your vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently. We handle routine tasks to prevent issues and extend your car’s lifespan. With expert care, we help keep your vehicle safe, reliable, and road-ready.

Brake Repair Pads & Rotors​

Our Brake Repair Pads & Rotors service ensures your safety with expert replacement and repair, restoring smooth and reliable braking for your vehicle.

Shocks, Struts Replacement​

Our Shocks and Struts Replacement service improves your vehicle's handling, stability, and comfort by replacing worn components, ensuring a smoother and safer ride.

System Diagnosis & Repair​​

Our System Diagnosis & Repair service uses advanced tools to quickly identify and fix issues in your vehicle's engine, electrical, or mechanical systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.

Air Conditioning Services​​

Our Air Conditioning Services ensure your vehicle's climate control system is functioning efficiently. We provide comprehensive inspections, repairs, and recharges to keep you cool and comfortable in any weather.​

Tires & Wheel Balancing​​

Our Tires & Wheel Balancing service enhances your vehicle's safety and performance by providing expert tire installation, rotation, and precise wheel balancing, ensuring a smooth ride and optimal handling.

Towing Service

At Pistons, our towing service offers quick and reliable assistance 24/7. Whether you're stranded or need vehicle transport, our skilled team is ready to ensure your vehicle is towed safely and efficiently to your desired location.

Jump Start

At Pistons, our jump start service quickly assists you when your vehicle won’t start due to a dead battery. Our experienced technicians arrive on-site to safely jump-start your vehicle and get you back on the road in no time.

Body Repair & Painting

At Pistons, we offer expert body repair and paint services to restore your vehicle’s appearance and integrity. Our skilled technicians use high-quality materials and techniques to ensure a flawless finish that brings your car back to life.

Need a Roadside Assistance?

If you need roadside assistance, Pistons is your reliable partner for quick and efficient help. Our dedicated team is available 24/7, ready to assist you with everything from flat tires and dead batteries to lockouts and fuel delivery. With our extensive experience and commitment to customer satisfaction, we ensure that help arrives promptly and that your vehicle is treated with the utmost care. Choosing Pistons means you’re not just getting roadside assistance; you’re choosing peace of mind knowing that you have a trusted expert by your side in any situation.

Request an Assistance

Our Costumer Say

Our Trusted Work is built on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. Our skilled technicians use high-quality parts and best practices, ensuring every service meets rigorous standards. We prioritize clear communication and honest estimates, fostering strong relationships with our customers. Your trust is our greatest achievement, and we aim to exceed your expectations with every visit.

I can't recommend Pistons enough! From the moment I walked in, the team was friendly and attentive. They diagnosed my car’s issues quickly and explained everything in detail without any pressure to upsell services I didn’t need. The repairs were completed on time and at a fair price. My car has never driven better! It's clear that they genuinely care about their customers and take pride in their work. I’ll definitely be returning for all my future car needs!
Howard Chavez​
Entrepreneur​
I had an outstanding experience at Pistons! The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to answer all my questions. They performed a thorough inspection and provided honest recommendations without pushing unnecessary services. The quality of their work is excellent, and my car runs like new! I appreciate their transparency and commitment to customer satisfaction. I will be recommending them to friends and family!
Lucas Elliot
Designer​

OUR STAFF

We Have Hard Working Team to Take Care of Your Car

At Pistons, our hardworking team is dedicated to providing exceptional care for your car. With skilled technicians who are passionate about delivering top-quality repairs and maintenance, we ensure your vehicle gets the attention it deserves. Choosing us means trusting a team that works tirelessly to keep your car safe, reliable, and road-ready.

Meet The Team

At Pistons, our team is the heart of our success, bringing years of expertise and dedication to every service. Each member is highly skilled and committed to providing the best care for your vehicle, from routine maintenance to complex repairs. Meet the team that works tirelessly to ensure your car runs smoothly and safely!

Jihad Kabalan

Shop Owner

With over 25 years of experience, Jihad Kabalan is the driving force behind Pistons. His passion for quality service and customer satisfaction has built the shop’s reputation as a trusted name in automotive repair.

Facebook Twitter Youtube Linkedin
Moussa Saliba

Maintenance Technician

Moussa Saliba brings extensive knowledge and experience to his role as a maintenance technician at Pistons. His dedication to precision and thoroughness ensures that every vehicle he services runs smoothly and efficiently.

Facebook Twitter Youtube Linkedin
Daniel el Aawar

Senior Engineer

As a Senior Engineer at Pistons, Daniel el Aawar is known for his expert problem-solving skills and in-depth automotive knowledge. With years of experience, he leads complex diagnostics and repairs, ensuring each vehicle is serviced with the highest level of precision and care.

Facebook Instagram Linkedin
Salim Sukkar

Salim Sukkar is a skilled technician and mechanic at Pistons, specializing in diagnostics and vehicle repairs. His hands-on expertise and attention to detail ensure that every car receives top-notch service, keeping your vehicle running smoothly and safely.

This is a short description elaborating the service you have mentioned above.​​
Facebook Instagram Twitter
Samer Mortada

Service Advisor

As a Service Advisor at Pistons, Samer Mortada bridges the gap between customers and technicians. With excellent communication skills and a deep understanding of automotive services, he ensures clients receive clear, honest information about their vehicle’s needs and the best solutions available.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Wordle
item.content:encoded:
We Care about Your Car

At Pistons, we pride ourselves on providing top-notch, reliable, and efficient car repair services that clients can trust. With years of experience, a team of highly skilled mechanics, and a commitment to excellence, we ensure every repair is done right the first time. We use the latest diagnostic tools and high-quality parts to guarantee your vehicles performance and safety. Whether it's a routine maintenance check or complex repairs, we handle every job with care, precision, and integrity. When you choose us, you're not just getting a quick fix you're investing in long-lasting quality and peace of mind. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we strive to be the best choice you've made for your car.

Emergency Call 24/7
Make An Appointment
Book an Appointment
Working Hours
  • Week Days: 05:00 18:00
  • Saturday: 05:00 14:00
  • Sunday: 10:00-14:00
Emergency Calls 24/7

01-456852

Call Now

What We Do

At Pistons, we pride ourselves on being Beirut's top choice for car repair, offering expert service and quality you can trust. Our experienced technicians use advanced diagnostic tools to deliver precise repairs, ensuring your vehicle runs smoothly. With transparent communication and a commitment to customer satisfaction, choosing Pistons means investing in reliable automotive care.

Our Services

Auto Maintenance Services

Our Auto Maintenance Services ensure your vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently. We handle routine tasks to prevent issues and extend your cars lifespan. With expert care, we help keep your vehicle safe, reliable, and road-ready.

Brake Repair Pads & Rotors

Our Brake Repair Pads & Rotors service ensures your safety with expert replacement and repair, restoring smooth and reliable braking for your vehicle.

Shocks, Struts Replacement

Our Shocks and Struts Replacement service improves your vehicle's handling, stability, and comfort by replacing worn components, ensuring a smoother and safer ride.

System Diagnosis & Repair

Our System Diagnosis & Repair service uses advanced tools to quickly identify and fix issues in your vehicle's engine, electrical, or mechanical systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.

Air Conditioning Services

Our Air Conditioning Services ensure your vehicle's climate control system is functioning efficiently. We provide comprehensive inspections, repairs, and recharges to keep you cool and comfortable in any weather.

Tires & Wheel Balancing

Our Tires & Wheel Balancing service enhances your vehicle's safety and performance by providing expert tire installation, rotation, and precise wheel balancing, ensuring a smooth ride and optimal handling.

Why Choose Us

At Pistons, we understand that your vehicle is a vital part of your daily life, which is why we are dedicated to providing the highest quality car repair services. With a team of highly trained and experienced technicians, we utilize advanced diagnostic tools and top-tier parts to ensure every repair is handled with precision and care. Our commitment to transparency means youll receive honest estimates and clear communication throughout the process, giving you peace of mind. Whether you need routine maintenance or complex repairs, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service that keeps your vehicle safe and reliable. Choosing us means choosing a partner you can trust to keep you on the road with confidence.

Expert Engineers

Our Expert Engineers are skilled professionals committed to delivering top-quality automotive care. Using advanced diagnostic tools, they provide precise solutions for all maintenance and repair needs, ensuring your vehicle runs smoothly and safely.

Experience Skills

Our Experience Skills reflect years of automotive expertise, allowing our technicians to diagnose and repair a wide range of issues effectively. Committed to continuous learning, we stay updated on the latest technologies and techniques, ensuring top-notch service and reliability for your vehicle.

Guarantee Service

Our Guarantee Service provides peace of mind with every repair, backed by warranties on parts and labor. If any issues arise after service, were committed to making it right, reflecting our confidence in our workmanship. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

Trusted Work

Our Trusted Work is rooted in reliability and quality. Our skilled technicians deliver consistent, high-quality automotive services using the best practices and parts. With transparent communication and a focus on customer satisfaction, weve earned the trust of our community for all your automotive needs.

Request Call Back

[wpforms id="139"]

Our Customer Say

Our Trusted Work is built on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. Our skilled technicians use high-quality parts and best practices, ensuring every service meets rigorous standards. We prioritize clear communication and honest estimates, fostering strong relationships with our customers. Your trust is our greatest achievement, and we aim to exceed your expectations with every visit.

I can't recommend Pistons enough! From the moment I walked in, the team was friendly and attentive. They diagnosed my cars issues quickly and explained everything in detail without any pressure to upsell services I didnt need. The repairs were completed on time and at a fair price. My car has never driven better! It's clear that they genuinely care about their customers and take pride in their work. Ill definitely be returning for all my future car needs! Howard Chavez Entrepreneur I had an outstanding experience at Pistons! The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to answer all my questions. They performed a thorough inspection and provided honest recommendations without pushing unnecessary services. The quality of their work is excellent, and my car runs like new! I appreciate their transparency and commitment to customer satisfaction. I will be recommending them to friends and family! Lucas Elliot Designer  4.6/5

At Pistons, we pride ourselves on providing top-notch, reliable, and efficient car repair services that clients can trust. With years of experience, a team of highly skilled mechanics, and a commitment to excellence, we ensure every repair is done right the first time. We use the latest diagnostic tools and high-quality parts to guarantee your vehicles performance and safety. Whether it's a routine maintenance check or complex repairs, we handle every job with care, precision, and integrity. When you choose us, you're not just getting a quick fix you're investing in long-lasting quality and peace of mind. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we strive to be the best choice you've made for your car.

At Pistons, we understand that your vehicle is a vital part of your daily life, which is why we are dedicated to providing the highest quality car repair services. With a team of highly trained and experienced technicians, we utilize advanced diagnostic tools and top-tier parts to ensure every repair is handled with precision and care. Our commitment to transparency means youll receive honest estimates and clear communication throughout the process, giving you peace of mind. Whether you need routine maintenance or complex repairs, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service that keeps your vehicle safe and reliable. Choosing us means choosing a partner you can trust to keep you on the road with confidence.

I can't recommend Pistons enough! From the moment I walked in, the team was friendly and attentive. They diagnosed my cars issues quickly and explained everything in detail without any pressure to upsell services I didnt need. The repairs were completed on time and at a fair price. My car has never driven better! It's clear that they genuinely care about their customers and take pride in their work. Ill definitely be returning for all my future car needs!
Howard Chavez
Entrepreneur

I had an outstanding experience at Pistons! The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to answer all my questions. I appreciate their transparency and commitment to customer satisfaction. I will be recommending them to friends and family!
Lucas Elliot
Designer

We Care about Your Car

At Pistons, we pride ourselves on providing top-notch, reliable, and efficient car repair services that clients can trust. With years of experience, a team of highly skilled mechanics, and a commitment to excellence, we ensure every repair is done right the first time. We use the latest diagnostic tools and high-quality parts to guarantee your vehicle’s performance and safety. Whether it’s a routine maintenance check or complex repairs, we handle every job with care, precision, and integrity. When you choose us, you’re not just getting a quick fix — you’re investing in long-lasting quality and peace of mind. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we strive to be the best choice you’ve made for your car.

Emergency Call 24/7
Make An Appointment
Book an Appointment
Working Hours
  • Week Days: 05:00 – 18:00
  • Saturday: 05:00 – 14:00
  • Sunday: 10:00-14:00
Emergency Calls 24/7

01-456852

Call Now

What We Do

At Pistons, we pride ourselves on being Beirut’s top choice for car repair, offering expert service and quality you can trust. Our experienced technicians use advanced diagnostic tools to deliver precise repairs, ensuring your vehicle runs smoothly. With transparent communication and a commitment to customer satisfaction, choosing Pistons means investing in reliable automotive care.

Our Services

Auto Maintenance Services​

Our Auto Maintenance Services ensure your vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently. We handle routine tasks to prevent issues and extend your car’s lifespan. With expert care, we help keep your vehicle safe, reliable, and road-ready.

Brake Repair Pads & Rotors​

Our Brake Repair Pads & Rotors service ensures your safety with expert replacement and repair, restoring smooth and reliable braking for your vehicle.

Shocks, Struts Replacement​

Our Shocks and Struts Replacement service improves your vehicle's handling, stability, and comfort by replacing worn components, ensuring a smoother and safer ride.

System Diagnosis & Repair​​

Our System Diagnosis & Repair service uses advanced tools to quickly identify and fix issues in your vehicle's engine, electrical, or mechanical systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.

Air Conditioning Services​​

Our Air Conditioning Services ensure your vehicle's climate control system is functioning efficiently. We provide comprehensive inspections, repairs, and recharges to keep you cool and comfortable in any weather.

Tires & Wheel Balancing​​

Our Tires & Wheel Balancing service enhances your vehicle's safety and performance by providing expert tire installation, rotation, and precise wheel balancing, ensuring a smooth ride and optimal handling.

Why Choose Us

At Pistons, we understand that your vehicle is a vital part of your daily life, which is why we are dedicated to providing the highest quality car repair services. With a team of highly trained and experienced technicians, we utilize advanced diagnostic tools and top-tier parts to ensure every repair is handled with precision and care. Our commitment to transparency means you’ll receive honest estimates and clear communication throughout the process, giving you peace of mind. Whether you need routine maintenance or complex repairs, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service that keeps your vehicle safe and reliable. Choosing us means choosing a partner you can trust to keep you on the road with confidence.

Expert Engineers

Our Expert Engineers are skilled professionals committed to delivering top-quality automotive care. Using advanced diagnostic tools, they provide precise solutions for all maintenance and repair needs, ensuring your vehicle runs smoothly and safely.

Experience Skills

Our Experience Skills reflect years of automotive expertise, allowing our technicians to diagnose and repair a wide range of issues effectively. Committed to continuous learning, we stay updated on the latest technologies and techniques, ensuring top-notch service and reliability for your vehicle.

Guarantee Service

Our Guarantee Service provides peace of mind with every repair, backed by warranties on parts and labor. If any issues arise after service, we’re committed to making it right, reflecting our confidence in our workmanship. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

Trusted Work

Our Trusted Work is rooted in reliability and quality. Our skilled technicians deliver consistent, high-quality automotive services using the best practices and parts. With transparent communication and a focus on customer satisfaction, we’ve earned the trust of our community for all your automotive needs.

Request Call Back

[elementor-element data=""]

Our Customer Say

Our Trusted Work is built on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. Our skilled technicians use high-quality parts and best practices, ensuring every service meets rigorous standards. We prioritize clear communication and honest estimates, fostering strong relationships with our customers. Your trust is our greatest achievement, and we aim to exceed your expectations with every visit.

I can't recommend Pistons enough! From the moment I walked in, the team was friendly and attentive. They diagnosed my car’s issues quickly and explained everything in detail without any pressure to upsell services I didn’t need. The repairs were completed on time and at a fair price. My car has never driven better! It's clear that they genuinely care about their customers and take pride in their work. I’ll definitely be returning for all my future car needs!
Howard Chavez​
Entrepreneur​
I had an outstanding experience at Pistons! The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to answer all my questions. They performed a thorough inspection and provided honest recommendations without pushing unnecessary services. The quality of their work is excellent, and my car runs like new! I appreciate their transparency and commitment to customer satisfaction. I will be recommending them to friends and family!
Lucas Elliot
Designer​

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: Wordle
item.content:encoded:
Contact Us

At Pistons, were here to help with all your automotive needs. Whether you have a question, need to schedule a service, or require emergency roadside assistance, our team is ready to assist you. Get in touch with us today!

Send Your Queries

Curabitur aliquet quam id dui posuere blandit.

[wpforms id="139"]

Contact Details

  • Address: Verdun,
  • Beirut, Lebanon.
  • Number: +961-1-456852
  • Email: contact@pistons.repair.com

Opening Hours

  • Weekdays: 5:00 AM 6:00 PM
  • Saturday: 5:00 AM 2:00 PM
  • Sunday: 10:00 AM-2:00 PM

Contact Us

At Pistons, we’re here to help with all your automotive needs. Whether you have a question, need to schedule a service, or require emergency roadside assistance, our team is ready to assist you. Get in touch with us today!

Send Your Queries

Curabitur aliquet quam id dui posuere blandit.

Contact Details

  • Address: Verdun,
  • Beirut, Lebanon.
  • Number: +961-1-456852
  • Email: contact@pistons.repair.com

Opening Hours

  • Weekdays: 5:00 AM – 6:00 PM
  • Saturday: 5:00 AM – 2:00 PM
  • Sunday: 10:00 AM-2:00 PM

OUR STAFF

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Wordle
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.content:encoded:
Contact Us

A descriptive paragraph that tells clients how good you are and proves that you are the best choice that theyve made. This paragraph is also for those who are looking out for a reliable car repair.

Send Your Queries

  • Address: 123 Fifth Avenue,
  • New York 10160, USA.
  • Number: +91-123-456-7890
  • Email: contact@example.com

Opening Hours

  • Weekdays: 9:00 AM 5:00 PM
  • Saturday: 9:00 AM 1:00 PM
  • Sunday: Close
